summary: Critical upstream outage. Target is unreachable and DNS resolution is failing.

details.error: DNS query timed out after 3 attempts.

diagnosis.explanation: Complete failure to reach the target. All outbound probes (ping, traceroute, dns, http) are failing beyond the local ISP gateway (hop 2). This indicates a major ISP or transit provider outage.
diagnosis.suggested_action: Contact your ISP's support immediately. There is a high probability of a widespread outage.

diagnosis.explanation: DNS resolution is failing, likely as a symptom of the broader upstream outage.
diagnosis.suggested_action: Confirm DNS failure is part of the larger outage. No separate action needed until primary connectivity is restored.
